channel.title: Fist on Tabletop Ergonomics
channel.description: Recent content in Fist on Tabletop Ergonomics

item.title: FIST Operative Handbook
item.description: FIST Operative Handbook - PDF FIST half-letter character sheet - PDF Source Code (Typst) I’m a big fan of FIST, a TTRPG about paranormal mercenaries (think Metal Gear) doing jobs for regular people no one else can (or no one else wants to) during the Cold War (think The A-Team). One of my favorite parts is how quickly a character can be generated, and how flavorful these characters are. Check out FISTREF’s Random Merc page if you want to see it in action for yourself.
